item.name: Evil Trinket: Compass
item.text: A Compass that always points to Mulmaster.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Paper Fan
item.text: A paper fan that won't produce a breeze no matter how hard it's waved.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Familiar Potato
item.text: A petrified potato that resembles someone important to you.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Glass Cup
item.text: A glass cup that can only be filled half way no matter how much liquid is poured into it.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Mirror
item.text: A mirror that only shows the back of your head.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Glass Bird
item.text: A small glass bird that when set down near water dips its head in as if to get a drink.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Lady's Coin Purse
item.text: A lady's coin purse containing two sharp fangs.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Conch Shell with writing
item.text: A small sea conch with the words "From the beginning" painted on the lip.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Silver Locket
item.text: A frost-covered silver locket that's frozen shut.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Coat of Arms Seal
item.text: A seal which imprints a mysterious, unknown coat of arms into hard rock.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Wooden Doll
item.text: A small wooden doll that when held brings back fond memories.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Handmirror
item.text: A small handmirror which only reflects inanimate objects.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Glass Eyeball
item.text: A glass eyeball that looks about of its own accordance, and can roll around.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Glass Orb
item.text: A glass orb that replicates yesterday's weather inside itself.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Refilling Drinking Cup
item.text: A drinking cup, that randomly fills with fresh or salt water. Refilling once emptied.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Blue Piece of Flint
item.text: A deep blue piece of flint, that when struck with steel produces not a spark but a drop of water.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Damp Conch Shell
item.text: A conch shell which is always damp and constantly drips saltwater.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Pewter Clasp
item.text: A charred, half-melted pewter clasp that glows as if smoldering but releases no heat.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Clockwork Finch
item.text: A clockwork finch that flaps its wings in the presence of a breeze.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Humming Jar
item.text: A unbreakable sealed jar of glowing water that hums when shaken.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Irridescent Geode
item.text: A small, finely polished geode whose crystals slowly fade between every color of the spectrum.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Stone Eye
item.text: A rough stone eye pulled from a petrified creature.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Stone Smoking Pipe
item.text: A stone smoking pipe that never needs lighting.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Whistle
item.text: A small whistle, that when blown, whispers a name of a person or place unknown to you, instead of the whistle sound.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Fist-sized Rock
item.text: A fist sized rock that "beats" like a heart.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Dolphin-shaped Bronze Scissors
item.text: A pair of bronze scissors in the shape of a pair of leaping dolphins.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Bronze Oil Lamp
item.text: A bronze oil lamp which is rumored to have once held a genie.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Gauntlet with Fire Motif
item.text: A single gauntlet inscribed with a fire motif and an unfamiliar name in Primordial.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Fish in Spherical Vial
item.text: A one-eyed little fish inside a spherical vial, much bigger than the vial's neck. He has a cunning look.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Tiny Rabbit Skull
item.text: The tiny skull of a rabbit that whispers scathing insults when nobody is looking.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Owlbear Rag Doll
item.text: A rag doll in the likeness of an owlbear.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Dessicated Lizard
item.text: The desiccated body of a small eight-legged black lizard.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Toy Boat
item.text: A small toy boat made with a walnut shell, toothpick, and piece of cloth.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Pocket Mirror
item.text: A small pocket mirror that slowly fogs over while held.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Glowing Wind Chimes
item.text: Wind chimes that glow when the wind blows.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Clay Square with Rune
item.text: A small, clay square with an unknown rune etched into one side.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Self-Heating Tea Kettle
item.text: A tea kettle that heats itself when filled with water.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Old Monocle
item.text: An old scratched monocle which shows an underwater landscape whenever someone looks through it.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Set of Primordial Dice
item.text: A set of dice with elemental symbols and primordial runes instead of pips or numbers.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Mood Amulet
item.text: An amulet filled with liquid that churns, freezes, or boils to match its wearer's mood.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Silver Bell
item.text: A small silver bell that makes a sound like quiet, distant thunder when it's struck.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Vial of Black Sand
item.text: A small vial of black sand that glows slightly in the moonlight.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Engraved Whale Tooth
item.text: A small whale tooth with etched with an image of waves crashing upon a beach.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Reverse-Flow Hourglass
item.text: An hourglass in which the sands pour upward instead of downward.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Glass Pendant
item.text: A glass pendant with a hole in the center that a mild breeze always blows out of.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Heavy Feather
item.text: A soft feather that falls like a stone when dropped.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Whispering Large Transparent Gem
item.text: A large transparent gem that, when gripped tightly, whispers in Terran.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Crystal Snowglobe
item.text: A small crystal snowglobe that, when shaken, seems to form silhouettes of dancing forms.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Palm-sized Geode
item.text: Half of a palm-sized geode that pulses dimly with purple light.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Underwater Book
item.text: A book filled with writing that only appears when the book is held underwater.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Red Leather Sealed Envelope
item.text: A sealed envelope made of red leather that you haven’t been able to open. It smells of campfire.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Locket of Hair
item.text: A locket of hair that is rumored to have come from a famed fire genasi.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Flint and Steel
item.text: Flint and steel that, when used to start a fire, creates a random colored flame.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Wet Parchment
item.text: A blank piece of wet parchment that never seems to dry.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Brass Puzzle Box
item.text: A small puzzle box made of brass, that is slightly warm to the touch.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Cloudy Glass Chunk
item.text: A cloudy chunk of glass that is said to hold a spark of breath from a blue dragon.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Crude Coal Chalice
item.text: A crude chalice made of coal.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Miniature Brass Horn
item.text: A miniature brass horn, silent when played, but fills the air with the scent of warm and exotic spices.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Eye-sized Blue Pearl
item.text: An eye-sized blue pearl that floats in salt water.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Dark Metal Tuning Fork
item.text: A tuning fork made from a dark metal which glows with a pale, white light during thunderstorms.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Vial of Autumn
item.text: A small vial that is always filled with the smell of autumn wind.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Clear Glass Ball
item.text: A clear marble that slowly rolls toward the nearest source of running water.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Silver Cup
item.text: A small collapsible silver cup that perspires constantly when opened.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Mist Hourglass
item.text: An hourglass that tells time with falling mist instead of sand.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Ornate Razor
item.text: An ornate razor, which only cuts in freezing cold temperature.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Etched Sharks Tooth
item.text: A shark tooth covered in tiny etched words from a lost language.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Unmarked Large Brass Coin
item.text: A large brass coin with no markings or images on it.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Wooden Box
item.text: A small wooden box filled with a strange red clay.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small, Rusted Iron Anchor Necklace
item.text: A necklace with a small, rusted iron anchor.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Brass Flute
item.text: A small brass flute adorned with silver wire that is always faintly sounding.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Red and Black Aarakocra Feather.
item.text: A red and black Aarakocra feather.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Palm-sized Stone
item.text: A palm-sized stone with a hole in it, through which can be heard a constantly whispering wind.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Black Crystal Conch Shell
item.text: A small conch shell covered in black crystal.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Brass Music Box
item.text: A small music box made of brass. It features a pair of tiny automatons that resemble Azer working at a forge.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Glass Jar with Corpse
item.text: A glass jar containing the preserved corpse of an unfamiliar aquatic creature.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Petrified Wood Seashell
item.text: A piece of petrified wood carved into the shape of a seashell.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Elemental Wooden Puzzle
item.text: A wooden puzzle cube covered in elemental symbols.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Small Stone Cube
item.text: A small stone cube that acts as a magnet when placed against another stone.

item.name: Evil Trinket: White Metal Ring
item.text: A ring made of a white metal. On the inside is a name etched in Auran.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Fishhook Bracelet
item.text: A bracelet made of silvered fish hooks.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Book of Primordial Poetry
item.text: A journal filled with poetry hand-written in Primordial.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Yellow Gemstone
item.text: A yellow gemstone that glows dimly when a storm is nearby.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Charred Chisel
item.text: A charred chisel with an unfamiliar symbol stamped into its base.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Canteen with Orange Mud
item.text: A canteen filled with a foul smelling orange mud.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Faceless Driftwood Doll
item.text: A faceless doll made of driftwood.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Heavy Iron Key
item.text: A heavy iron key bearing the name of a ship long lost to the sea.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Turtle-shell Jewelry Box
item.text: A small jewelry box made from the shell of a turtle.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Fire Myrmidon Chess Piece
item.text: A chess piece fashioned to look like fire myrmidon.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Elemental Spinning Top
item.text: A spinning top with an image of one of the four elements on each side.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Red Stone Earring
item.text: A single hoop earring made of a porous red stone.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Blue Coral Comb
item.text: A small comb made of blue coral.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Seven Sandstone Beads on a String
item.text: Seven small beads of sandstone on a string, all different colors.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Undercommon Romance Book
item.text: A romance book written in undercommon titled "Just one Layer of Grey".

item.name: Evil Trinket: Tiny, Broken Clockwork Harpy.
Evil Trinket: Barnacle-covered Cog
item.text: A fist-sized cog, covered in barnacles.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Obsidian Eyepatch
item.text: An eyepatch made of obsidian and a black leather cord.

item.name: Evil Trinket: Glass Bottle with Ship
item.text: A glass bottle with a tiny ship of unfamiliar design inside.
